display_long_description:
# Unite for Battle and Glory in This Awarded Tabletop Adventure
Gather your friends for an epic, turn-based battle in Demeo! Fight to free the world of Gilmerra from terrifying monsters and dark forces. **Roll the dice, command your miniatures, and experience endless replayability** with a huge variety of monsters, classes, and environments. No two games are the same, capturing the spirit of classic tabletop RPGs in immersive VR.

Demeo is more than just a game; it’s a social experience that brings friends together. Cooperative gameplay makes **strategizing, teamwork, and celebrating victories** incredibly rewarding. The Heroes’ Hangout adds a social space beyond combat, where you can meet fellow adventurers, relax, and enjoy fun activities.

‎‎‎ ‎

# New Adventures Await: Explore Five Epic Campaigns
Take on one of five thrilling adventures, each offering unique challenges, enemies, and strategic opportunities. Whether you’re exploring the eerie depths of The Black Sarcophagus or braving the wilderness in Roots of Evil, your quest for victory will test your skill and teamwork.
- The Black Sarcophagus
- Realm of the Rat King
- Roots of Evil
- Curse of the Serpent Lord
- Reign of Madness

‎‎‎ ‎

# Key Features:
🎲 **Endless Strategy** – Command your team through immersive, turn-based gameplay. With a vast range of enemies, spells, and classes, every match requires tactical decision-making and cooperation, ensuring every adventure is fresh and engaging.

⚔️ **Multiplayer Co-Op** – Play with up to four friends in a true test of strategy and teamwork as you face increasingly challenging enemies. Cross-platform play ensures that everyone can join, making it easy to gather your adventuring party.

🤙 **Heroes’ Hangout** – Take a break from adventure in the Heroes’ Hangout. Here, you can meet new players, paint miniatures, practice archery, play the Hauntlet arcade game, and learn tips and lore. It’s a lively social hub that keeps the fun going between campaigns.

🌍 **Delve into the Dungeons** – Explore the varied dungeons of Gilmerra, each filled with dangerous monsters and strategic obstacles. The beautifully designed environments and atmospheric details make each dungeon crawl an unforgettable experience.

💥 **Challenging Yet Rewarding** – Enjoy a balanced experience where every victory feels earned. Each battle demands careful planning and teamwork, making the thrill of success even sweeter.

🌐 **Cross-Platform Accessibility** – Play across different platforms, allowing friends on VR and non-VR devices to join forces, making Demeo an accessible adventure for everyone.

‎‎‎ ‎

# Critical Acclaim:
“An **infinitely replayable**, widely accessible, easy-to-learn (yet difficult to master) tabletop-inspired game that feels just as good in a VR headset as it does on any gaming PC” – IGN

“VR done right” – InTheGame.NL

“Demeo is pure, uncut geek wish fulfillment.” – Gaming Nexus‎‎

[media]
‎‎

# Become the Heroes Gilmerra Needs!
Join the adventure, roll the dice, and lead your team to victory. With endless strategic possibilities, incredible social interaction, and five complete campaigns to explore, Demeo offers **the ultimate tabletop fantasy experience**.
